fastpickup:
OutputLogMessage("fastpickup\n")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lalt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("ralt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
	Sleep(10)
	PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)

	local lastItemCp = {
		300 / 2560 * 65535,
		1210 / 1440 * 65535
	}
	local itemHeight = 83 / 1440 * 65535

	-- 重复 3 次动作，强化拾取成功率
	for i = 1, 3 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(32767, 32767)
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end

	Sleep(10 )
	MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2])
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
fastlickbox:
OutputLogMessage("fastlickbox\n")
    PressAndReleaseKey("lshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lalt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("ralt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
	Sleep(10)
	PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)

	local lastItemCp = {
		300 / 2560 * 65535,
		1210 / 1440 * 65535
	}
	local itemHeight = 83 / 1440 * 65535

	-- 重复 3 次动作，强化拾取成功率
	for i = 1, 3 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(670 / 2560 * 65535, 710 / 1440 * 65535) -- 修改为背包的坐标
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end

	Sleep(10)
	MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2])
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
fastdiscard:
OutputLogMessage("fastdiscard\n")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lalt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("ralt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
	Sleep(10)
	PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)
	local lastItemCp = {
		630 / 2560 * 65535,
		1210 / 1440 * 65535
	}
	local itemHeight = 83 / 1440 * 65535
	-- 清空背包 第一轮
	Sleep(10)
	for i = 1, 5 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(0, 0)
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end
	-- 清空武器
	Sleep(10)
	local itemPos = {
		{ 1770, 180 },
		{ 1770, 480 },
		{ 1770, 780 },
		{ 1770, 1050 },
		{ 2120, 1050 }
	}
	for i = 1, #itemPos do
		MoveMouseTo(itemPos[i][1] / 2560 * 65535, itemPos[i][2] / 1440 * 65535)
		PressAndReleaseMouseButton(3)
	end
	-- 清空背包 第二轮
	Sleep(10)
	for i = 1, 5 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(0, 0)
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end
	-- 清空装备
	Sleep(10)
	local itemPos2 = {
		{ 900, 392 },
		{ 900, 630 },
		{ 900, 720 },
		{ 900, 808 },
		{ 1605, 397 },
		{ 1605, 481 },
		{ 1605, 632 },
		{ 1605, 719 },
		{ 1605, 807 },
		{ 1605, 1049 },
		{ 1605, 1229 }
	}
	for i = 1, #itemPos2 do
		MoveMouseTo(itemPos2[i][1] / 2560 * 65535, itemPos2[i][2] / 1440 * 65535)
		-- Sleep(300)
		PressAndReleaseMouseButton(3)
	end
	Sleep(10)
	MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2])
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
leftbutton:
vars["left"] = true
    if not ads(vars) then
        return
    end
    start_time = GetRunningTime()
    dorecoil(vars)
rightbutton:
vars["right"] = true
    if vars["autorecognize"] then
        dofile(vars["autorecognize_file"])
        vars["weapon"] = rweapon
        vars["pose"] = rpose
        vars["scope"] = rscope
        vars["a2"] = rattachment2
        vars["a3"] = rattachment3
    end
    if (vars["autoshift"] and vars["scope"] >= vars["autoshiftscope"]) or (table[vars["weapon"]]["shift"] == true) then
        Sleep(10)
        PressKey("lshift")
    end
    if not ads(vars) then
        return
    end
    start_time = GetRunningTime()
    dorecoil(vars)
dorecoil:
repeat
        ClearLog()
        logout=""
        logout = logout .. "---Recoil---\n"

        if current_time then
            loading_time=GetRunningTime() - current_time
            logout = logout .. "Loading:	" .. loading_time .. "\n"
        end

        current_time = GetRunningTime()

        if vars["debug"] then
            movex = 10
        else
            movex = 0
        end
        movey = 0

        if vars["autorecognize"] then
            dofile(vars["autorecognize_file"])
            vars["pose"]=rpose
        end

        step = math.ceil(((current_time - start_time == 0 and {1} or {current_time - start_time})[1]) / table[vars["weapon"]]["speed"])

        if step > table[vars["weapon"]]["max"] then	
            logout = logout.."Finished \n"
            if vars["debug"] then
                PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)
            end
            return
        end

        base = table[vars["weapon"]]["base"]

        movey = base

        for index,value in ipairs(table[vars["weapon"]]["ballistic"]) do
            if (step >= value[1] and not (index==#table[vars["weapon"]]["ballistic"]) and step < table[vars["weapon"]]["ballistic"][index+1][1]) then
                movey = base + value[2] 
                break
            elseif ( index==#table[vars["weapon"]]["ballistic"] ) then
                movey = base + table[vars["weapon"]]["ballistic"][index-1][2]
                break
            end
        end
        
        movey = movey * table[vars["weapon"]]["limit"] * table[vars["weapon"]]["scope_sensitive"][vars["scope"]] * table[vars["weapon"]]["pose_sensitive"][vars["pose"]] * table[vars["weapon"]]["attachment2_sensitive"][vars["a2"]]* table[vars["weapon"]]["attachment3_sensitive"][vars["a3"]]
 
        if (table[vars["weapon"]]["single"] == true) then
            -- 连点武器自动开启
            if (current_time - start_time)%table[vars["weapon"]]["speed"] < 15 then	
                PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)
            end

        elseif (vars["left"] and vars["right"]) then
            if (IsModifierPressed("lshift") and (vars["scope"] < 3)) then
                movey = movey * 1.35
            elseif (vars["aim"]) then
            end
        elseif (vars["aim"]) then
            -- 肩射灵敏度
            -- movey = movey * aim_rate
            movey = movey * 1.3
        end

        if vars["autorecognize"] and step>3 then
            movey = movey + ry
            movex = rx + movex
            if not (movex == 0) then
                logout = logout .. rx .. ":" .. ry .. "\n"
            end
        end

        if loading_time and loading_time < table[vars["weapon"]]["speed"] then
            movex = movex * (loading_time/table[vars["weapon"]]["speed"])
            movey = movey * (loading_time/table[vars["weapon"]]["speed"])
        end


        movex = math.floor(movex+0.5)
        movey = math.floor(movey+0.5)

        logout=logout.."AutoRecognize:	" .. tostring(vars["autorecognize"]) .. "\n"
        logout = logout .. "Weapon:	" .. vars["weapon"] .. "\n"
        logout=logout .."Scope:	" .. vars["scope"] .. "\n"
        logout = logout .. "Pose:	" .. vars["pose"] .. "\n"
        logout=logout.."Attachment 2:	" .. vars["a2"] .. "\n"
        logout=logout.."Attachment 3:	" .. vars["a3"] .. "\n"
        logout=logout.."Hold breath:	" .. tostring((vars["autoshift"] and vars["scope"] >= vars["autoshiftscope"]) or (table[vars["weapon"]]["shift"]) ) .. "\n"
        logout=logout.."Step:	" .. step .. "\n"
        logout=logout.."Move:	" .. movex .. ":" .. movey .. "\n"
       OutputLogMessage(logout)

        if movey > 120 then
            -- move最大支持120
            movey = 120
        end

        MoveMouseRelative(movex, movey)
        Sleep3(loading[1])
        until (not IsMouseButtonPressed(1))
script:
EnablePrimaryMouseButtonEvents(true)

config = {{}}
vars = {{}}

dofile("{}")
bindkeys(config,vars)

function Sleep3(time)
    local a = GetRunningTime()
    while GetRunningTime()-a < time do
    end
end

function OnEvent(event, arg)
    for _,key in pairs(config["keys"]) do
	  buttonconfig = config[key]
        if arg == buttonconfig["button"] then
            match = true
            for _,modifier in pairs(buttonconfig["modifier"]) do
                if not IsModifierPressed(modifier) then
                    match = false
                end
            end
            if match then
                local func = _G[buttonconfig["funcPress"]]
                if func and event=="MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED" then
                    func(vars)
                    return
                else
                    func = _G[buttonconfig["funcRelease"]]
                    if func then
                        func(vars)
	    return
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end
